summary: The Streamlining the Solid Start Communications Act (H.R. 3386) aims to improve outreach to veterans under the Department of Veterans Affairs' Solid Start program. The bill proposes amending Title 38 of the United States Code, specifically section 6320(b), by replacing "tailored mailings" with "tailored lines of communication." This includes a broader range of communication methods, such as mailings, text messaging, virtual chatting, and other electronic messaging formats.
